13.eng-name: The Book on Divorce and Li'an
13.ara-name: كتاب الطلاق واللعان عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn Umar narrated:"I had a wife whom I loved, but my father disliked her, so he ordered me to divorce her but I refused. I mentioned that to the Prophet and he said: 'O Abdullah bin Umar! Divorce your wife

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرَّجُلِ يَسْأَلُهُ أَبُوهُ أَنْ يُطَلِّقَ زَوْجَتَهُ
chapter.eng-name: What has been related about a man whose father asks him to divorce (his wife)
